solution_line_template: Two times the minutes it took Dawn to wash the dishes is {dawn_minutes_dishes}*{two_times_multiplier}= <<{dawn_minutes_dishes}*{two_times_multiplier}={dawn_minutes_doubled}>>{dawn_minutes_doubled}
Andy took {dawn_minutes_doubled}+{andy_additional_minutes}= <<{dawn_minutes_doubled}+{andy_additional_minutes}={andy_laundry_minutes}>>{andy_laundry_minutes} minutes to put away the laundry
